mapper.select: select p.customerPlanID,p.contractID,p.constructUnit,p.projectName,p.projectAddr ,p.consPos,p.conStrength,p.slump,p.castMode,p.planCube,p.needDate,p.planDate,p.linkMan,p.tel,p.auditStatus from CustomerPlan p,Contract c where c.contractID = p.contractID and c.CustomerID = #{customerID} and p.auditStatus=0 order by p.autoid

select p.customerPlanID,p.contractID,p.constructUnit,p.projectName,p.projectAddr ,p.consPos,p.conStrength,p.slump,p.castMode,p.planCube,p.needDate,p.planDate,p.linkMan,p.tel,p.auditStatus from CustomerPlan p,Contract c where c.contractID = p.contractID and c.CustomerID = #{customerID} and p.auditStatus=1 order by p.autoid
